comments.author: sui.han@oracle.com
comments.creator: sui.han@oracle.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; SunOS i86pc; rv:9.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0.1
Build ID: 20120110095621

Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch Firefox and Orca Speech.
2. Click 'View' -> 'Character Encoding'
3. Navigate the sub-menu of 'Character Encoding'



Actual results:

The sub-menu of 'Character encoding' can not be read by Orca.


Expected results:

The sub-menu of 'Character encoding' should be read by Orca.
